ovdesc.p: This local table contains the parameter setup for Related party transaction reports.

desc.p: The product name to be considered for the Related Party Transaction report.
The interest property to be considered for interest income and interest expense for the Related Party Transaction report.
This field is used to mention the number of days from which the average GL balance is to be calculated for the applicable GL lines and rolling average balance
Field type as Numeric and Field length as 3 characters.
To update the fees that are to be excluded from the calculation of unearned income under Collateral Type Report.
To specify the list of Cash type of collaterals which has to be excluded from the calculation of Loan To Value.
